attributeList.name: n_logical_qubits
attributeList.doc: Number of logical qubits in the quantum circuit

attributeList.name: single_qubit_counts
attributeList.doc: Dictionary where the keys are the names of the single-qubit gates and the values are lists containing the counts of the single-qubit gates for each logical qubits

attributeList.name: two_qubit_counts
attributeList.doc: Dictionary where the keys are the names of the two-qubit gates and the values are lists containing the counts of the two-qubit gates for each logical qubits

attributeList.name: basis_gates
attributeList.doc: List containing the names of the gates of the universal set for the hardware

attributeList.name: T1
attributeList.doc: List containing the T1 of each physical qubit

attributeList.name: T2
attributeList.doc: List containing the T2 of each physical qubit

attributeList.name: readout_error
attributeList.doc: List containing the readout error of each physical qubit

attributeList.name: rx_error
attributeList.doc: List containing the errors of RX gate (for each physical qubit)

attributeList.name: rz_error
attributeList.doc: List containing the errors of RZ gate (for each physical qubit)

attributeList.name: sx_error
attributeList.doc: List containing the errors of SX gate (for each physical qubit)

attributeList.name: x_error
attributeList.doc: List containing the errors of X gate (for each physical qubit)

attributeList.name: cz
attributeList.doc: List containing the errors of CZ gate (for each connected pair of physical qubits)

attributeList.name: n_physical_qubits
attributeList.doc: Number of physical qubits in the hardware

attributeList.name: final_mapping
attributeList.doc: Optimized mapping logical -> physical qubits (label for a ML model)
